<style type='text/css'>
  .btn-green {
    background-color: #1ab394;
    color: #fff;
    border-radius: 3px;
  }
  .btn-green:hover, .btn-green:focus {

title: [Rating] Customer Effort Score (CES) form - English

headCode:
<link href='https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.3.1/css/bootstrap.min.css' rel='stylesheet'>
<link href='https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css' rel='stylesheet'>
<style>
  body {
    background-color: #eee
  }
  div.stars {
    width: 270px;
    display: inline-block
  }
  .mt-200 {
    margin-top: 200px
  }
  input.star {
    display: none
  }
  label.star {
    float: right;
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 36px;
    color: #4A148C;
    transition: all .2s
  }
  input.star:checked~label.star:before {
    content: '\f005';
    color: #FD4;
    transition: all .25s
  }
  input.star-5:checked~label.star:before {
    color: #FE7;
    text-shadow: 0 0 20px #952
  }
  input.star-1:checked~label.star:before {
    color: #F62
  }
  label.star:hover {
    transform: rotate(-15deg) scale(1.3)
  }
  label.star:before {
    content: '\f006';
    font-family: FontAwesome
  }
</style>
<script type='text/javascript' src='https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.3.1/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js'>
</script>
title: [Rating] Customer Feedback Score (CFS) by Star Rating

mediaInfo:
[Survey Header Image URL] https://tuyensinhvnuk.edu.vn/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/cropped-vnuk-symbol-only-official.png
[Survey Header] Student Evaluation of Online Teaching
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Description] The Vietnam - UK Research and Training Institute is constantly innovating and improving the quality to better meet the learning needs of the students. Your sincere feedback through this survey will help the Institute to capture information and make timely adjustments, thereby improving the quality of training. Thank you for your contribution.
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Group] major-of-study => Your major of study
[Survey Group Option] Computer Science
[Survey Group Option] Data Science
[Survey Group Option] Information Systems
[Survey Group Option] Software Engineering
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Decision Maker Label] Who is the final decision maker for your enrollment at VNUK ?
[Decision Maker Option] Myself
[Decision Maker Option] My parents
[Decision Maker Option] My friends
[Decision Maker Option] my neighbours
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Original Source Label] Which is the first channel that you hear about us ?
[Survey Original Source Option] Website
[Survey Original Source Option] Facebook
[Survey Original Source Option] YouTube
[Survey Original Source Option] Friends
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Media Source Label] Which media channels do you hear about us ?
[Survey Media Source Option] Website
[Survey Media Source Option] Facebook
[Survey Media Source Option] YouTube
[Survey Media Source Option] Friends
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Evaluated Object] Name of course
[Survey Evaluated Object Option] Mathematics 
[Survey Evaluated Object Option] Programming
[Survey Evaluated Object Option] Statistics 
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Evaluated Person] The lecturer
[Survey Evaluated Person Option] Nguyen van An
[Survey Evaluated Person Option] Le Thi Van
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Rating Question Guide] Consider the following statements, please click on the button to select a best option
[Survey Rating Choices] [1] Strongly Disagree üòî; [2] Disagree üôÅ; [3] Undecided üòê; [4] Agree üôÇ; [5] Strongly Agree üòä
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Rating Question Group] Lecture content
[Survey Rating Question] 1: The lecturer was well-prepared
[Survey Rating Question] 2: The lecturer gave interesting and informative classes 
[Survey Rating Question] 3: The lecturer was good at explaining things 
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Rating Question Group] Teaching style
[Survey Rating Question] 1: The lecturer taught at an appropriate pace 
[Survey Rating Question] 2: The lecturer was effective in leading the class 
[Survey Rating Question] 3: The lecturer was receptive to student's questions
[-----------------------------------------------------------------] 
[Survey Extra Question Guide] Extra questions
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Extra Text Question] current-courses-for-learning-outcomes => 1) Do you think the courses in the current Curriculum of the Faculty contribute to the achievement of Program Learning Outcomes? If no, please explain
[-----------------------------------------------------------------] 
[Survey Extra Text Question] new-courses-for-learning-outcomes => 2) What course do you think the Faculty needs to add to the Curriculum so you can achieve the Learning Outcomes before completing your Training program? Please explain:
[-----------------------------------------------------------------] 
[Survey Comment] 3) Any other comments
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Multiple Choice Question] primary-reasons-for-vnuk => Please tell us why you chose this program ? 
[Survey Multiple Choice] primary-reasons-for-vnuk => Social Media
[Survey Multiple Choice] primary-reasons-for-vnuk => YouTube
[Survey Multiple Choice] primary-reasons-for-vnuk => My Friends
[Survey Multiple Choice] primary-reasons-for-vnuk => My Parents
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Multiple Choice Question] primary-reasons-study-online => Please tell us why you chose study online ? 
[Survey Multiple Choice] primary-reasons-study-online => Easier
[Survey Multiple Choice] primary-reasons-study-online => Fast
[Survey Multiple Choice] primary-reasons-study-online => Simple
[Survey Multiple Choice] primary-reasons-study-online => On-demand learning
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Single Choice Question] final-purpose =>  Please tell us the final purpose after your graduation ? 
[Survey Single Choice] final-purpose => To get an job
[Survey Single Choice] final-purpose => Money
[Survey Single Choice] final-purpose => Impress my friends
[Survey Single Choice] final-purpose => For my Parents
[-----------------------------------------------------------------]
[Survey Footer Image URL] https://tuyensinhvnuk.edu.vn/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/cropped-vnuk-symbol-only-official.png
[Survey Footer] THANK YOU
title: [Survey] Student Evaluation of Teaching Form - General template
